css_fun_attribute.description: 返回属性取值 CSS2 eg: attr(href)

css_fun_caculate.description: 计算长度取值 CSS3 eg: calc(100% - 10px)

css_fun_hsl.description: 返回颜色取值 CSS3 eg: hsl(120,100%,25%)

css_fun_hsla.description: 返回颜色取值 CSS3 eg: hsla(120,100%,25%,0.3)

css_fun_rgb.description: 返回颜色取值 CSS2 eg: rgb(192,192,192)

css_fun_rgba.description: 返回颜色取值 CSS3 eg: rgba(255,0,255,0.3);

css_fun_linear_gradient.description: 返回颜色取值 CSS3 eg: linear-gradient(45deg, #2989d8 30%, #7db9e8 31%, #7db9e8 58%, #2989d8 59%);

css_fun_linear_gradient_repeat.description: 返回颜色取值 CSS3 eg: repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, #2989d8 30%, #7db9e8 31%, #7db9e8 58%, #2989d8 59%);

body: radial-gradient(shape size at position, start-color, ..., last-color);
css_fun_radial_gradient.description: 返回颜色取值 CSS3 eg:  radial-gradient(farthest-side at 60% 55%, blue, green, yellow, black);

body: repeating-radial-gradient(shape size at position, start-color, ..., last-color);
css_fun_radial_gradient_repeat.description: 返回颜色取值 CSS3 eg:  repeating-radial-gradient(farthest-side at 60% 55%, blue, green, yellow, black);

css_fun_var.description: 获自定属性值 CSS3 eg:  var(--main-txt-color);

css_fun_cubic_bezier.description: 建贝塞尔曲线 CSS3 eg:  cubic-bezier(0.1, 0.7, 1.0, 0.1);
